alert.note: Alert for Motherlode; Northern San Joaquin Valley; West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 8:42PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Tuolumne, southwestern Alpine and central Calaveras Counties through 930 PM PDT... At 841 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Angels City, or 10 miles southeast of San Andreas, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sonora, Calaveras Big Trees SP, San Andreas, Bear Valley, Pinecrest, Tamarack, Keystone, Long Barn, Carson Hill, Tuttletown, Vallecito, Black Springs, Moccasin, Copper Cove Village, Jupiter, Mountain Ranch, Springfield, Angels City, Chinese Camp and Dorrington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Motherlode; Northern San Joaquin Valley; West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada
